name: Heart of the Swarm
description:
An ancient evil has emerged from the depths of this Earth. Unleash the power of the swarm and consume the kingdom until it all descends to chaos.

This is a submission to #mizjam1, your ratings & feedback are much appreciated.

Intsructions:

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

CONSUME ANYTHING THAT MOVES

Good luck & have fun!

Credits:

Solo Development by Dani Alkountar https://twitter.com/DaniAlkountar

-Sprites by Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/

-SFXR sound effect generator https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
